wikipedia_page.main: David J. Morris (1888 – after 1911) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Birmingham. Born in Walsall, Staffordshire, Morris joined Birmingham in 1910, and made his debut in the Second Division on 9 September 1911 in a 2–1 defeat at Fulham. Morris played on the losing side in the next two games, looked out of his depth, and returned to non-league football in 1912.
